attributes.action: Make funding available for Anthony Sloyans Wheelchair lift to take him safely  to bed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
anthony is severaly disabled /confined to a wheelchair  is mentally / physically handicapped.
requires full care / partially sighted  has epilepsy and is on medication anthony has autism.
the social services have denied funding to replace his lift.
otis lift enginers gave a report to the social services stating the lift needed to be replaced as they had condemed it.
afsoneh sabouri operational manager attwood house 
 ashok khandelwal head of services assist & alison booth (ot) all from social services decided that my son should sleep down stairs alone knowing his medical conditions and how this would endanger his life.
anthony life is at risk and he needs to sleep upstairs where he always sleeps where he has a hoist for lifting him into his special bed supplied for his needs.funding is needed asap

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the relevant department.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
